code: import api from'./api';export const orderService={getOrders:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/orders/');return response.data.results||response.data;},getOrder:async id=>{const response=await api.get("/orders/".concat(id,"/"));return response.data;},createOrder:async orderData=>{const response=await api.post('/orders/create/',orderData);return response.data;}};
